description:
Data extracted from the PanCancer Atlas initiative on the GDC in Aug 2016. Contains Copy Number Variation data based on the GISTIC algorithm. 

Note: The original data was annotated with ParticipantBarcode, SampleBarcode, AliquotBarcode, SampleTypeLetterCode, SampleType and TCGA Study; and participants were subsequently filtered using the PanCancer Atlas whitelist (table Whitelist_ParticipantBarcodes )  

More details: https://www.synapse.org/#!Synapse:syn5031907 
and https://gdc.cancer.gov/about-data/publications/pancanatlas. This table has been deprecated. It has been copied to isb-cgc-bq.pancancer_atlas.Filtered_all_CNVR_data_by_gene.

fields.description: TCGA barcode identifier for the study participant, eg TCGA-02-0001
fields.name: ParticipantBarcode

fields.description: Barcode of the biospecimen sample, eg TCGA-13-1489-02A
fields.name: SampleBarcode

fields.description: Letter code of the sample type using the TCGA standards, eg TPN, EBV. Full list available at https://gdc.cancer.gov/resources-tcga-users/tcga-code-tables/sample-type-codes
fields.name: SampleTypeLetterCode

fields.description: There are 10 sample types: Blood Derived Normal, Primary solid Tumor, Solid Tissue Normal, Recurrent Solid Tumor, Metastatic, Additional - New Primary, Primary Blood Derived Cancer - Peripheral Blood, Buccal Cell Normal, Additioanal Metastatic, Bone Marrrow Normal
fields.name: SampleType

fields.description: TCGA study abbreviation, eg LAML. Full list available at https://gdc.cancer.gov/resources-tcga-users/tcga-code-tables/tcga-study-abbreviations
fields.name: Study

fields.description: eg TP53, LRP1B, etc (same as Hugo_Symbol field except blank instead of Unknown
fields.name: Gene_Symbol

fields.description: Full cytoband name, including chromosome. E.g, 17p13.2 See https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Class/MLACourse/Original8Hour/Genetics/chrombanding.html
fields.name: Cytoband
